statements: DELETE FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1 AND preference1 = 'value1';

DELETE FROM users WHERE age > 30 AND location = 'New York';

DELETE FROM personalized_content WHERE user_id = 1 AND personalization_score < 0.5;

DELETE FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' AND interaction_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM user_sessions WHERE end_time < start_time
DELETE FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 123 AND category = 'Tech';
DELETE FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe') AND interaction_type = 'like';
DELETE FROM personalized_content WHERE user_id = 456 AND content_id = (SELECT content_id FROM content WHERE category = 'Healthcare');
